property.name: Card Text
property.value:

property.name: Flavor
property.value: didn't see that coming! Curiously enough, the only thing that went through his mind as he was pulled up was "Oh no, not again.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Search your deck for up to 4 tactics. Put them into your discard pile.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: oh, my missing aggie! I told him we could play for keepsies, but I didn't think he'd *eat* them.

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
Draw 2 cards. Put a card from your hand on the bottom of your deck.

property.value:

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
UNIQUE Cryptic Athenaeum
[O][O][O]: At the start of your turn, you may draw a card. If you do, your opponent may draw a card.
[O][O][O][O][O]: At the start of your turn, your opponent discards a card.
[O][O][O][O][O][O][O]: At the start of your turn, you may pick a character. If you do, put it into its owner's hand.

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
At the start of each player's turn, that player chooses one of the following:
OPTION 1: Both players draw a card. Both players put a card from their hand on the bottom of their deck.
OPTION 2: Both players put a resource they control into its owner's hand. Both players may play a resource.
OPTION 3: Both players discard a card.
OPTION 4: Both players put a card from their hand on the top of their deck.
